member.summary: Defines a contract supported by all implementations of a persistence queue.

member.summary: Opens the specified persistence queue.

member.summary: Persists the specified stream of data into the queue.

member.returns: A data transfer object carrying the details of the persisted queue item.

member.summary: Retrieves data from the specified queue item stored in the persistence queue. Doesn't remove the item from the queue.
member.param: The unique identity of the queue item.
The optional set of XPath expressions defining a header portion of the queue data.
The optional set of XPath expressions defining a body portion of the queue data.
The optional set of XPath expressions defining a footer portion of the queue data.
The optional XML namespace manager that will be used for XML namespace resolution.
member.returns: An instance of the XML reader that provides non-cached, forward-only access to queue item data.

member.summary: Performs a query against the XML data stored in the queue item.
member.param: The unique identity of the queue item.
One or more XPath expressions which will be invoked against the queue item's XML data.
The XML namespace manager that will be used for XML namespace resolution.
member.returns: An instance of the XML reader that provides non-cached, forward-only access to queue item data.

member.summary: Removes the specified queue item from the persistence queue.

member.returns: A flag indicating whether or not the queue item has been actually deleted.

member.name: M:Contoso.Cloud.Integration.Azure.Services.Contracts.IPersistenceQueue.Close
